visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The title and axes labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis categories represent months, and the y-axis title indicates temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data, with a custom color for the series. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins and background color.
